title: Lag Spikes in Rankeds
body:
Title. Me and my friends were both experience lag spikes at the same times during our games. We are from 2 different regions so it's the server of LoL.

Please fix it we lost partly because of this.

replies.body: Anybody who is NOT on BELL ISP getting these?
I have the same problem. I'm in Quebec with Telebec (A Bell Canada company)

Like Ignis mentioned, I'm unfortunately seeing a lot of packet loss concerning Bell and Rogers across Canada and NE United States. We're still looking into what the main cause is and it seems to be part of the backbone that many ISP's uses. Try letting our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan your network logs as well, and hit me up with that screenshot so I can look into it!

Be a bro and let us know when you guys fix it. I'd play more if it was affecting everyone but when i dodge a blitz hook like a champ and then 2 seconds later I'm standing at his feet. well, it's not super chill

> [{quoted}](name=GrüberMeister,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1VluGcrg,comment-id=00060001,timestamp=2017-08-08T01:09:06.261+0000)
>
> Be a bro and let us know when you guys fix it. I'd play more if it was affecting everyone but when i dodge a blitz hook like a champ and then 2 seconds later I'm standing at his feet. well, it's not super chill

I have Rogers and it's still happening. Seems that the ping spikes come and go at a steady interval. Like my ping starts spiking after 40 minutes and then returns to normal after 30 minutes and so on. Really weird since I've never seen this kind of packet loss in my 6 years of playing this game.

I've been following this thread for a little while.  I'm with Bell ISP.

It seems the packet losses are subsiding (Greater Ottawa area) for now.  However instead of my ping being 25~26, it's now static 34 (from most previous normal game).

(I'm directly connected, 300mbps down, 50mbps up)

https://gyazo.com/251810ef6a092f796a2aa25d9b4b655e

Just got this today, pretty annoying

This might be just an ISP issue. [There's a thread on reddit ](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6s9frb/current_client_lag_anyone/)where people seem to live somewhat near and [there's an outage map](http://canadianoutages.com/status/bell/map/).

Same thing happened to me today. Connection is like flawless 99% of the time. This is happening a lot now.

Thank Urf I decdied to 'warm up' with a normal game before jumping into ranked.

That log thing is a joke, I am getting samething with same comments. I always never had any lag spikes until today. I even upgraded my internet to 100mbps. This is RIOT problem and their new client that they insist that it is good thing and a jump to better thing!

[There's a rioter asking for pictures of network logs](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/E8AFF3g7-league-ping-is-in-the-300s-nothing-else-lags-except-for-league?comment=0000). Include those in posts concerning lag issues

[Here's what page spitted out for me.](https://www.dropbox.com/s/v9gavc9qq53yx1v/packetLoss.png?dl=0)

Additional notes concerning my personal issue:
- I restarted client after a death to see if it would help (it didn't)
- I closed all of the active applications that could have been downloading something
- I'm alone and there's no other device connected to the network
- I never have connection issues
- My brother (different city) also is having lag spikes
Samething here, ping normal but had tons of lag spikes. I couldnt do anything except standing and dying!
Got the same thing in a match just now.
